DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter, randomized, double-blind, triple-dummy, group-comparison study using placebo and nitrazepam as a comparative drug.
DOC.brief_title: A Double-blind, Group-comparison P-III Study With Zolpidem MR Using Placebo and Nitrazepam in Insomnia Patients
DOC.criteria: Nonorganic insomnia associated with schizophrenia and manicdepressive psychosis. Patients with allergic reactions to zolpidem or nitrazepam; Patients with serious cardiac disorders; serious hepatic impairment; serious renal diseases.
